name: NEOGEO HEROES Ultimate Shooting
description:
The "Ultimate Shoot 'Em Up" featuring a rich and varied cast of SNK characters! 10 heroes and heroines originating from numerous NEOGEO titles join forces with Doctor Brown Sugar to protect peace. Making use of a time machine, the evil organization "The Damned" attempts to spread chaos throughout history. The fate of the world is in your hands!

"NEOGEO" and "KOF" are registered trademarks of SNK PLAYMORE CORPORATION

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item.
